title: LUNCHBOX STUDIOS TURNS TEN / TYPE PROMOTION:
content:
LUNCHBOX STUDIOS TURNS TEN!!   
We are celebrating our 10 year anniversary with a huge typeface sale!   
For the next 2 weeks, our entire award winning font library is available for only $350. Instant Download + CD   
OFFER GOOD UNTIL NOVEMBER 15th   
   
The award winning Lunchbox Digital Typeface library has been seen worldwide on MTV, A&E, ABC, HBO, hundreds of TV commercials, film promotions, sports, music and style   
publications. Lunchbox Typefaces have been featured in many typography books including "Web Type, Symbol of Icon Fonts Online, The Best Fonts Online. The Lunchbox Type Library   
consists of 65 typefaces. $2,061 worth of typefaces sold together for a limited time.   
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_   
   
ORDER TODAY : Call 212.337.8843 or order online at   
 [http://www.lunchboxstudios.com/fonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125904/http:/www.lunchboxstudios.com/fonts.html)
author: lunchboxstudios
